data.name: How CIOs help organizations digitally transform in challenging situations
data.summary:
The current work landscape in India, its opportunities and challenges
Trends and insights emerging from the new dynamic
Short-term strategies for CIOs in the dynamic
How tech can pivot an organisation for the better in the dynamic
Case studies and best practises from India and the world
Longterm strategies and the way forward for the industry
The role of Cisco Webex in enabling digital transformation
data.speakers:
Brian Roche, CIPO, BIAL
Vivek Saha, Director & head | Digital Transformation & Industry 4.0, Nasscom CoE
Renald Abel, Head & AVP, Systems Tehnology Group, Hexaware Technologies Ltd
Sudhir Nayar, Managin Director, Sales, Cisco
Shraddha Sharma, Founder & CEO, Your Story
